turns.speaker: user
turns.utterance: Okay, I'm starving. I want to order some food, but I'm in the mood for something new. Any recommendations? I'm open to anything except seafood, had a bad experience last week.

turns.speaker: agent
turns.utterance: Certainly! Based on your preferences and current location, I recommend trying 'Spice Route'. They offer a variety of authentic Indian dishes with excellent vegetarian and meat options. They have a 4.5-star rating and are known for their flavorful curries. Would you like to see their menu or explore other options?

turns.speaker: user
turns.utterance: Indian sounds good! But how spicy are we talking? I'm not a huge fan of super-hot food, if you know what I mean. I need to be able to taste the food!

turns.speaker: agent
turns.utterance: Spice Route allows you to specify your spice level when ordering. You can choose from mild, medium, or hot. Many reviewers also mention that their 'mild' is flavorful without being overpowering. I can also check for specific menu items that are known to be less spicy, such as butter chicken or korma. turns.speaker: user
